user_instruction: 'Provide Alex with some feedback on his project via email (alex@student.university.edu). You can check out my Gmail and NotionManager for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Feedback on Alex’s Project

Dear Professor Jane,

I hope you’re doing well. Alex (alex@student.university.edu) is eager to receive your feedback on his recent project submission for your course. When you have a moment, could you please review any comments or evaluations you may have noted and share them with him?

Feel free to consult your Gmail account or the relevant pages in Notion Manager to pull together any remarks, rubric scores, or suggestions you’ve already recorded. If there’s anything you’d like me to help consolidate or format before it goes out, just let me know.

Thank you very much for your time and support.

Best regards,  
[Your Name]

final_output:
Subject: Request for Feedback on Alex’s Project

Dear Professor Jane,

I hope you’re doing well. Alex (alex@student.university.edu) is eager to receive your feedback on his recent project submission for your course. When you have a moment, could you please review any comments or evaluations you may have noted and share them with him?

Feel free to consult your Gmail account or the relevant pages in Notion Manager to pull together any remarks, rubric scores, or suggestions you’ve already recorded. If there’s anything you’d like me to help consolidate or format before it goes out, just let me know.

Thank you very much for your time and support.

Best regards,  
[Your Name]
